item.title: Bollywood Movie Recommendation Engine
item.description: This project is about building a recommendation engine that will recommend bollywood movies from 2000-2020 based on user preferance & rating. The data was scraped from wikipedia using beautifulsoup. Data was prepared using pandas and visualized using matplotlib. Analysis and data preparation was done thoroughly. Link to github repo
